backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining DefectReport types with Department enum, storage using Map, and public functions to create reports and query them by all, department, or product name.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: defect submission form, list view with filtering, photo upload handling via blob-storage, and manufacturing-themed UI design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing routing, layout, pages, form/list components, React Query hooks, and styling with OKLCH color system and Tailwind config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with manufacturing-appropriate neutral and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Factory Defect Tracker'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining root route with Layout wrapper and three routes: index and /submit for SubmitDefectPage, /reports for ViewDefectsPage.
frontend/src/components/DefectReportForm: Form component with controlled inputs for product name, department select, employee ID, description textarea, and photo upload with preview, progress tracking via ExternalBlob, and success notification.
frontend/src/components/DefectReportList: Table component displaying defect reports with department filter dropdown, color-coded badges, photo thumbnails that open in modal dialog, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header (logo, title, navigation to Submit/Reports pages), main content area, and footer with branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the ICP backend actor with authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all defect reports, filtering by department, and creating new defect reports with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom manufacturing-themed color palette using OKLCH colors (warm neutrals, safety orange accent, charcoal gray primary) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitDefectPage.tsx: Page component for submitting defect reports with heading, quality control guidelines alert, and DefectReportForm component.
frontend/src/pages/ViewDefectsPage.tsx: Page component for viewing defect reports with heading, description, and DefectReportList component for displaying and filtering reports.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking manufacturing quality control app features including multi-department workflow, defect reporting with photos, and pending backend implementation requirements.
